title: New Client Issues
body: So for the past month, i have  connected late on so many games, disconnected from so many games, get insane lag, and i have  to deal with 20 minute leaver busters. now all this is already making me want to quit the game, but ill give riot another chance. I login today, go through my 20 minute waiting time, and see "attempt to join queue failed". OK so I'm mad as fuck now, lets try this again, and the same thing happened twice. I tried reverting to the old launcher but nothing works. I restarted my computer, restarted league, uninstalled and reinstalled, and did a client fix. all to no avail.  All i wanted was to play this game and riot can't even fix its fucking launcher. I am so done.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Sorry for the late reply, but it seems to have been fixed. I can now load into games, buuuut I still have high ping. I have tried some of the steps on the connection faq, but It isnt working/has a very small effect. please help me..{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Wow that's hella unfortunate to wait through a 20 min LPQ only to not be able to connect!!
 {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

Lemme see if I can get to the bottom of why you weren't able to get into the match queue. Since reverting to the old client and reinstalling didn't work, we can probably rule out any issues with the client itself. If everything works okay until the moment your network connects to the matchmaking servers, then something might be blocking that connection. 

Check out the steps in this [**connection faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and we should be able to narrow down what's really happening.
